## ciliumctl bpf ipcache

Manage the IPCache mappings for IP/CIDR <-> Identity

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for ipcache
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
      --config string   Config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
  -D, --debug           Enable debug messages
  -H, --host string     URI to server-side API
```

### SEE ALSO

* [ciliumctl bpf](ciliumctl_bpf.md)	 - Direct access to local BPF maps
* [ciliumctl bpf ipcache get](ciliumctl_bpf_ipcache_get.md)	 - Retrieve identity for an ip
* [ciliumctl bpf ipcache list](ciliumctl_bpf_ipcache_list.md)	 - List endpoint IPs (local and remote) and their corresponding security identities
